engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_who_use_drugs: West Tisbury is collaborating with the County of Dukes County to pool funds with all island Municipalities to design a program by which to expend Abatement Funds received by the island Municipalities, subject to the requirements set forth in State- Subdivision Agreement, and in a manner intended to optimize their impact and serve the public health needs of the island Municipalities.
